title: MENTIONING IT ALL: Bravocon, RHOBH Reunion, RHOP Recap, & More!
itunes:title: MENTIONING IT ALL: Bravocon, RHOBH Reunion, RHOP Recap, & More!
description:
Danny is back to recap the Bravo of it all, from Bravocon announcements, RHONY reboots, RHOBH reunion episodes, Winter House, and The Real Housewives of Potomac!


RHOP Recap: 30:15ish


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino

Patreon: www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
